name: Tyler Courtright
text: Understaffed location. Food may be late, but it will arrive and be correct. If it's cold or something does turn out to be wrong, it will be corrected. Quality of staff and food is superior compared to other Pizza Hut locations.

name: brien chavis
text: Small pizza slice sizes.  About 1.5 inch wide crust and super thin crust....salad bar was good.  Staff was nice

name: Barry Brindle
text: Pizza crust and toppings were satisfactory as were the brownies...the pizza just literally had no sauce on it save for a very small amount near crust...very disappointing. It made for a very dry pizza. Definitely not satisfied with this location.

text: Great customer service when they've messed up multiple of my orders but always mess something up when it's here. text: As we walked in the manager, Clarance, greeted us and apologised that the salad bar was not fully set up yet. How refreshing to be greeted! He was so nice! Service was fast and our deep dish cheese. pizza ROCKED! The cheese had a delicious salty flavor. Our whole experience was great.

name: Sarah Ledford
text: Last Sunday I ordered two pizzas to be delivered. They arrived promptly but were really low quality. The crust extremely thin for stuffed crust, the bottom was burnt, there was very little sauce or toppings. For $50 after tip, for two pizzas I expected more. Won't make the mistake of ordering here again.
